data.title: Maxis Bhd (MAXIS) – Company Profile and SWOT Analysis
data.meta_description: Maxis Bhd (MAXIS) - Company Profile & SWOT Analysis, is a source of comprehensive company data and information. The report covers the
data.text:
Maxis Bhd (MAXIS) – Company Profile & SWOT Analysis, is a source of comprehensive company data and information. The report covers the company's structure, operation, SWOT analysis, product and service offerings and corporate actions, providing a 360˚ view of the company.

Key Highlights

Maxis Bhd (Maxis), a subsidiary of Binariang GSM Sdn Bhd, provides telecommunication services and Internet technology services. It provides business broadband, business fiber Internet, business voice enhanced, eSMS, Maxi One Business+ Office 365 suite, mPOS payment service, business telephone services, business voice enhanced and integrated service digital network. It also offers Internet access, business broadband, domestic private leased circuit, cyber security, internet of things, cloud computing, enterprise SMS solutions, machine to machine solutions and calls and voice management. Maxis makes provision for an international gateway network that offers cross border interconnect services and domestic fixed-line networks that offer voice and data services. The company owns, maintains, builds, and operates radio facilities and associated switches. It has operations across Malaysia, and Indonesia. Maxis is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

Scope

• Detailed information on Maxis Bhd required for business and competitor intelligence needs

• A study of the major internal and external factors affecting Maxis Bhd in the form of a SWOT analysis

• An in-depth view of the business model of Maxis Bhd including a breakdown and examination of key business segments

• News about Maxis Bhd, such as business expansion, restructuring, and contract wins

• Large number of easy-to-grasp charts and graphs that present important data and key trends

Reasons to buy

• Gain understanding of Maxis Bhd and the factors that influence its strategies.

• Track strategic initiatives of the company and latest corporate news and actions.

• Assess Maxis Bhd as a prospective partner, vendor or supplier.

• Support sales activities by understanding your customers' businesses better.

• Stay up to date on Maxis Bhds business structure, strategy and prospects.

Note: Some sections may be missing if data is unavailable for the company.
